title: Ellen's perfect raspberry and white chocolate cheesecake
ingredients: ['1 pack digestive biscuits, crushed', '2 tablespoons margarine', '1 (200g) tub cream cheese', '300g caster sugar', '400g white chocolate, melted', 'a few handfuls of frozen raspberries, thawed', '1 flake chocolate bar', 'a few fresh raspberries to decorate']
